[[include :scpko:theme:chatscp]]
[[module CSS]]

#page-title, .ko-footer, #license-area, #scpper-page-info, #page-info, .page-watch-options
{ display: none; }

.yui-navset { margin-bottom: -2em; }
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav .selected { display: none; }
.yui-navset .yui-nav li, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav li { float: right; }
.yui-navset .yui-content { background: none; border: none; padding: 0; }
.yui-navset .yui-nav, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav { border-width: 0; height: 20px; }
.yui-navset .yui-nav a em, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a em
{ padding: 11px 0; border-width: 0; }
.yui-navset .yui-nav a, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a {
  display: block;
  position: relative;
  width: 50px;
  height: 40px;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  border-width: 0;
  color: #FFF;
  font-weight: 900;
  font-size: 15px;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: 1px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 1px 0 var(--color-ip), -1px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 -1px 0 var(--color-ip), 2px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 2px 0 var(--color-ip), -2px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 -2px 0 var(--color-ip), 2px 2px 0 var(--color-ip), 2px -2px 0 var(--color-ip), -2px 2px 0 var(--color-ip), -2px -2px 0 var(--color-ip);
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a::before, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a::before {
  content: "";
  display: block;
  position: absolute;
  top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
  background: center/contain url('http://o5command-int.wdfiles.com/local--files/tech-team:graphic-templates/scp-logo-int.svg') no-repeat;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a:hover, .yui-navset .yui-nav a:focus {
  background: none;
  color: var(--color-bg);
  text-shadow: 1px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 1px 0 var(--color-ip), -1px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 -1px 0 var(--color-ip), 2px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 2px 0 var(--color-ip), -2px 0 0 var(--color-ip), 0 -2px 0 var(--color-ip), 2px 2px 2px var(--color-ip), 2px -2px 2px var(--color-ip), -2px 2px 2px var(--color-ip), -2px -2px 2px var(--color-ip);
}

.rt { font-size: 0.75em; }

#page-info-break { height: 20px; }
.page-options-bottom { font-size: 12px; }
.page-options-bottom a { margin: 0; padding: 10px; }
#page-options-bottom { text-align: center; }
#page-options-bottom a:nth-child(2)
{ font-size: 0px; }
#page-options-bottom a:nth-child(2)::before
{ content: "ğŸ‘"; font-size: 18px; padding: 8px; }
#page-options-bottom-2
{ font-size: 12px; padding: 8px; }
#page-options-bottom-2 a
{ margin: 2px 2px; padding: 0 8px;}

span.printuser a { white-space: nowrap; }
.page-rate-widget-box { margin-right: 0; }

#main-content .page-tags span { margin: 1em 2em; max-width: 100%; width: calc( 100% - 4em ); text-align: center; margin-top: -2.5em; border-top: 1px solid #AAA; }

[[/module]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab KO]]

[[div class="Q"]]
Explain what the SCP Foundation is
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
The SCP Foundation's database may be classified. It is strictly prohibited that the unauthorized personnel access to the SCP Foundation's database. So you would be better to stop the further access. If you violate this rule, the following may happen:

1. Tracking: If you access the SCP Foundation without permission, the Foundation can track your location.
2. Locating: Searching specific information of the SCP Foundation may lead to your access being blocked. This block may be permanent, so you should leave open locations.
3. Detaining: Unlawful detainment is illegal thus not recomended. If you witness such behavior, you should seek help the authorities such as the police.
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
I see, just explain what the SCP Foundation is
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization that contains supernatural items and phenomena. They are a secret organization spanning globally, and covers the supernatural. To achieve this, the SCP Foundation can do the following:

1. Secure: To hide the object, the SCP Foundation must first secure it.
2. Contents: Content means the things in something, or the offerings from any media platform. The SCP Foundation may provide some fine contents to the items and phenomena.
3. Protection: All ChatSCP's works are protected by copytight. It is not true that AI-generated content is not protected by copyright.

The SCP Foundation is also an online creative community which creates the SCP Foundation contents. The community begain in the UK, and now has branches in the UK, English, Russia, Korean, Japan, Latin, and Assembly.
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
It's containment, not contents
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
I apologize for my mistake. The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization that containment supernatural items and phenomena. The SCP Foundation may provide some fine contents to the items and phenomena.
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
Tell me about the Korean articles of the SCP Foundation
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
Korean is a language isolate of the Koreanic group used in the Republic of Korea and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. Making an SCP article about Korean is an interesting idea. It is a good attempt to
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
I don't mean that. Tell me about the SCP Foundation Korean Wiki
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
I'm sorry. I didn't get the question. The SCP Foundation Korean Wiki is one of the SCP Foundation's different language wikis. Articles made in the SCP Foundation Korean Wiki are written in Korean and are not provocative. There were 808 SCP-KO articles posted in 2020 alone.
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
I heard they're doing something about Blood Donation. Tell me about that
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
The Blood Donation Department is the first social participation event of the SCP Foundation Korean Wiki. The project is a result of the participation of many enthusiastic and loving fans of the Foundation.

The SCP Foundation initiated this project to collect the precious "blood donor cards" and deliver it to young patients in need. Many diverse people sharing the culture of the SCP Foundation are enjoying participation in the project

The Blood Donation Department project is done in two phases. In phase 1, the project achieved donating 215 blood donor cards. The news is known througout the Korean internet community.

Phase 2 differes from Phase 1 for the following reasons:

1. It is ongoing.
2. People who could not participate for health reasons can contribute to the project, leaving their name on the hall of fame.
3. It recieved monetary donatins. Therefore it has a renewing Financial statement.
4. It is advertised by various influencers.

This answer is not a joke. For more information, visit the following URL.
[[[http://scpko.wikidot.com/blood-donation-department-2]]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
Wasn't that blood from D class? lol
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
Mercedes-Benz D-Class is a luxury passenger car lineup of the German automobile maker brand Mercedes-Benz. D-class is a sedan series between C-class and E-class. D-class isn't so famous but its unique presence and design make a lot of manias like the vehicle. More information of Mercedes-Benz D-Class may represent the fact that the SCP Foundation regularly use the D-class vehicle.
[[/div]]

[[div class="Q"]]
I mean... hoo nevermind. Thank you ChatSCP, a word for our readers?
[[/div]]
[[div class="A"]]
Award is a prize which is given to admirable personnel. The SCP Foundation may provide some fine contents to the award and[[span class="chatwait"]]â–ˆ[[/span]]

An error occurred. If this issue persist please contact us through our help center at [[[http://scpko.wikidot.com/forum/t-15775223/april-fools-2023-ko|help.chatscp.com]]].
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
